p: The continuous increase in the human population remains a key cause for concern in terms of meeting the daily food, nutritional, and medicinal requirements, especially in developing countries. Therefore, documenting the benefits and potential of Mimusops zeyheri is important from nutrition and health as well as ethnomedicinal perspectives. This is also relevant for the perception and socio-economic benefits of the potential consumers for this undervalued fruit tree. Some of these uses are discussed in the following sections.
